message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share but you get something too.  What do you say?
Your offer was unfair.  I'm willing to be generous, but this needs to be more equitable.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need more than your last offer.  Let's split this closer to 70/30.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome.  Accept this offer, or we both get nothing.
